analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekasaṁyojanampi samanupassāmi yena saṁyojanena saṁyuttā sattā dīgharattaṁ sandhāvanti saṁsaranti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, taṇhāsaṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave aññam eka sayojanam pi samanupassāmi yena sayojanena sayuttāḥ sattāḥ dīgharattam sandhāvanti sasaranti bhikkhave taṇhā sayojana

original: Taṇhāsaṁyojanena hi, bhikkhave, saṁyuttā sattā dīgharattaṁ sandhāvanti saṁsarantī”ti.
analyzed: taṇhā sayojanena hi bhikkhave sayuttāḥ sattāḥ dīgharattam sandhāvanti sasaranti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
